Title: College Website
Description: In this project I build a website where user can easily get information about college like college faculty, department, college fees & library using HTML & CSS. The purpose of build this project is to provide the college information in the  easiest way to the students. The Front-End part is built with HTML & CSS. Fully attractive, informatica & responsive with multiple pages.

Title: Mine-portfolio
Description: Welcome to My Portfolio This portfolio is a personal website designed to display my professional journey, skills, and accomplishments. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it features a clean, responsive design that adapts to various devices and screen sizes, ensuring a seamless user experience.
